sections.text:
71-2704.Health care providers; standards; effect of health care crisis protocol.

The health care crisis protocol does not change or alter the standard for malpractice or professional negligence for health care providers set forth in section 44-2810.

SourceLaws 2021, LB139, ยง 8.

Cross ReferencesCOVID-19 Liability Act, see section 25-3601.
